<div id="prepare-data-frame-of-simulation" class="section level2">
<h2>Prepare data frame of simulation</h2>
<ul>
<li>Use anthropogenic mortality from the Shiny interface</li>
</ul>
<div class="sourceCode" id="cb4"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb4-1"><a href="#cb4-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>session <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> shiny<span class="sc">::</span>MockShinySession<span class="sc">$</span><span class="fu">new</span>()</span>
<span id="cb4-2"><a href="#cb4-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>input <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">list</span>()</span>
<span id="cb4-3"><a href="#cb4-3" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>datasets <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">generate_datasets</span>(<span class="at">con =</span> conn_eurodiad)</span>
<span id="cb4-4"><a href="#cb4-4" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt; ── generate_datasets ───────────────</span></span>
<span id="cb4-5"><a href="#cb4-5" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>lang <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="st">&quot;fr&quot;</span></span>
<span id="cb4-6"><a href="#cb4-6" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb4-7"><a href="#cb4-7" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># Generate all inputs as in the Shiny application</span></span>
<span id="cb4-8"><a href="#cb4-8" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>countries <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">c</span>(<span class="st">&quot;all&quot;</span>, datasets[[<span class="st">&quot;countries_mortalities_list&quot;</span>]])</span>
<span id="cb4-9"><a href="#cb4-9" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb4-10"><a href="#cb4-10" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>mortalities <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">data.frame</span>(</span>
<span id="cb4-11"><a href="#cb4-11" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="co"># country = golem::get_golem_options(&#39;countries_mortalities_list&#39;),</span></span>
<span id="cb4-12"><a href="#cb4-12" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">country =</span> datasets[[<span class="st">&quot;countries_mortalities_list&quot;</span>]],</span>
<span id="cb4-13"><a href="#cb4-13" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">yearsimubegin =</span> </span>
<span id="cb4-14"><a href="#cb4-14" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    <span class="fu">rep</span>(<span class="fl">0.1</span>, <span class="fu">length</span>(datasets[[<span class="st">&quot;countries_mortalities_list&quot;</span>]])),</span>
<span id="cb4-15"><a href="#cb4-15" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">yearsimuend =</span> </span>
<span id="cb4-16"><a href="#cb4-16" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    <span class="fu">rep</span>(<span class="fl">0.5</span>, <span class="fu">length</span>(datasets[[<span class="st">&quot;countries_mortalities_list&quot;</span>]]))</span>
<span id="cb4-17"><a href="#cb4-17" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>)</span>
<span id="cb4-18"><a href="#cb4-18" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb4-19"><a href="#cb4-19" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>mortalities</span>
<span id="cb4-20"><a href="#cb4-20" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt;        country yearsimubegin</span></span>
<span id="cb4-21"><a href="#cb4-21" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt; 1      Denmark           0.1</span></span>
<span id="cb4-22"><a href="#cb4-22" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt; 2     Portugal           0.1</span></span>
<span id="cb4-23"><a href="#cb4-23" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt; 3      Morocco           0.1</span></span>

<span id="cb4-31"><a href="#cb4-31" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt; 11     England           0.1</span></span>

<span id="cb4-35"><a href="#cb4-35" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt; 1          0.5</span></span>
<span id="cb4-36"><a href="#cb4-36" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt; 2          0.5</span></span>

<span id="cb4-47"><a href="#cb4-47" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt; 13         0.5</span></span>
<span id="cb4-48"><a href="#cb4-48" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb4-49"><a href="#cb4-49" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># # build from sliders in interface </span></span>
<span id="cb4-50"><a href="#cb4-50" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># expand grid using full_join</span></span>
<span id="cb4-51"><a href="#cb4-51" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>anthropogenic_mortality <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">expand_anthropogenic_mortality</span>(</span>
<span id="cb4-52"><a href="#cb4-52" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  data_hsi_nmax, mortalities)</span>
<span id="cb4-53"><a href="#cb4-53" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb4-54"><a href="#cb4-54" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>selected_latin_name <span class="ot">=</span> <span class="st">&quot;Alosa alosa&quot;</span></span>
<span id="cb4-55"><a href="#cb4-55" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb4-56"><a href="#cb4-56" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># </span><span class="al">TODO</span><span class="co"> - In Shiny only - </span></span>
<span id="cb4-57"><a href="#cb4-57" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># Use https://shiny.rstudio.com/articles/progress.html</span></span>
<span id="cb4-58"><a href="#cb4-58" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>shiny<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">withProgress</span>(<span class="at">message =</span> <span class="st">&#39;Making Simu&#39;</span>, <span class="at">value =</span> <span class="dv">0</span>, </span>
<span id="cb4-59"><a href="#cb4-59" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>             <span class="at">session =</span> session, {</span>
<span id="cb4-60"><a href="#cb4-60" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># browser()</span></span>
<span id="cb4-61"><a href="#cb4-61" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>results <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">runSimulation</span>(</span>
<span id="cb4-62"><a href="#cb4-62" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  selected_latin_name, </span>
<span id="cb4-63"><a href="#cb4-63" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  data_simulation[[<span class="st">&quot;hydiad_parameter&quot;</span>]], <span class="co"># 11 rows</span></span>
<span id="cb4-64"><a href="#cb4-64" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="co"># Smaller for example</span></span>
<span id="cb4-65"><a href="#cb4-65" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  anthropogenic_mortality <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span> <span class="fu">filter</span>(year <span class="sc">&lt;=</span> <span class="dv">1955</span>), <span class="co"># 1800 rows</span></span>
<span id="cb4-66"><a href="#cb4-66" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  data_simulation[[<span class="st">&quot;catchment_surface&quot;</span>]], <span class="co"># 134 rows</span></span>
<span id="cb4-67"><a href="#cb4-67" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  data_simulation[[<span class="st">&quot;data_hsi_nmax&quot;</span>]], <span class="co"># 663300 rows</span></span>
<span id="cb4-68"><a href="#cb4-68" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  data_simulation[[<span class="st">&quot;data_ni0&quot;</span>]], <span class="co"># 4422 rows</span></span>
<span id="cb4-69"><a href="#cb4-69" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  data_simulation[[<span class="st">&quot;outlet_distance&quot;</span>]], <span class="co"># 18225 rows</span></span>
<span id="cb4-70"><a href="#cb4-70" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">verbose =</span> <span class="cn">TRUE</span></span>

<span id="cb4-81"><a href="#cb4-81" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="sc">|</span>                                </span>

<div id="graphs-for-nit" class="section level3">
<h3>Graphs for Nit</h3>
<div class="sourceCode" id="cb5"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb5-1"><a href="#cb5-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># graphics ----</span></span>
<span id="cb5-2"><a href="#cb5-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>Nit_list <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">get_model_nit</span>(results) </span>
<span id="cb5-3"><a href="#cb5-3" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb5-4"><a href="#cb5-4" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>basin <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="st">&#39;Mondego&#39;</span></span>
<span id="cb5-5"><a href="#cb5-5" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb5-6"><a href="#cb5-6" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&#39; Plot Nit predictions</span></span>
<span id="cb5-7"><a href="#cb5-7" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>model_res_filtered <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">nit_feature_species_basin</span>(</span>
<span id="cb5-8"><a href="#cb5-8" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">Nit_list =</span> Nit_list,</span>
<span id="cb5-9"><a href="#cb5-9" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">reference_results =</span> reference_results,</span>
<span id="cb5-10"><a href="#cb5-10" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">selected_latin_name =</span> selected_latin_name,</span>
<span id="cb5-11"><a href="#cb5-11" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">basin =</span> basin)</span>
<span id="cb5-12"><a href="#cb5-12" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </span>
<span id="cb5-13"><a href="#cb5-13" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># same function as for Page 3</span></span>
<span id="cb5-14"><a href="#cb5-14" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="fu">plot_nit</span>(model_res_filtered,</span>
<span id="cb5-15"><a href="#cb5-15" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>         <span class="at">selected_year =</span> <span class="dv">2073</span>,</span>
<span id="cb5-16"><a href="#cb5-16" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>         <span class="at">lg =</span> <span class="st">&quot;fr&quot;</span>,</span>
<span id="cb5-17"><a href="#cb5-17" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>         <span class="at">withNitStandardisation =</span> <span class="cn">FALSE</span>,</span>
<span id="cb5-18"><a href="#cb5-18" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>         <span class="at">with_colour_source =</span> <span class="st">&quot;source&quot;</span>)</span></code></pre></div>
